subtasks: Describing the significant achievement of farmers in feeding over a billion people
Expressing concern about the decreasing interest among youth in farming
Highlighting the high suicide rate among farmers (three lakh in the last twelve years)
Discussing the issues facing farmers due to irrigation and market access
Presenting a solution of farmers-producers organizations for scale and economic attractiveness
Advocating for infrastructure and company involvement in irrigation and marketing
Discussing the potential economic impact of farmers-producers organizations (300% increase in agricultural income)
Encouraging government, corporates, social organizations, and financial institutions to support farmers-producers organizations
Emphasizing the potential to improve rural economy and lift 700 million people from poverty in five years

tasks.task: Addressing the challenges facing Indian agriculture
subtasks: Expressing worry over the shrinking number of young people willing to become farmers (less than 15%)
Sharing data on farmer suicides (three lakh in twelve years) as a significant problem
Critiquing the lack of investment in irrigation and market access
Proposing the formation of large-scale farmers-producers organizations to address scale issues
Discussing the benefits of aggregation of irrigation and marketing efforts
Outlining the potential economic transformation through farmers-producers organizations (200-300% increase in income)
Exhorting various sectors to collaborate and support rural development
